title: Japanese style font maybe? Please help identify
content:
If somebody can help me identify this font I would greatly appreciate it.  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120101550im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images_4260.jpg)
author: xhros

comments.content: The capital S is [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120101550/http:/www.identifont.com/show?C8V) by Charles Borges de Oliveira. Don’t know the lowercases …
